Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Makes it an unlawful discriminatory practice for prospective employers to make certain inquiries relating to criminal convictions
Summary: Establishes it shall be an unlawful discriminatory practice for any prospective employer to make an inquiry about, or to act upon adversely to the individual involved based upon, any criminal conviction of such individual unless such employer first makes a conditional offer of employment to such individual.
LawCode: Amd §§750 & 752, Cor L; amd §296, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the executive law, in relation to establishing that it is an unlawful discriminatory practice for prospective employers to make certain inquiries relating to criminal convictions
